name: s4len
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wceq(cfv(chash, cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3)), nat4)

stmt.origin: cats1len(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), nat4, cs3(c0, c1, c2), c3, nat3)

-| wceq(co(nat3, caddc, nat1), nat4)
